definition: to scrape/to blow/to shave/to plunder/to extort

sentences.english: E. g. When the wind blows up, all the windows rattle.
sentences.chinese: 只要一刮风，所有的窗户都吱吱地响。

sentences.english: As the wind blows we can hear the leaves rustle in the trees.
sentences.chinese: 刮风时，我们能听见树上的叶子发出飒飒的声音。

sentences.english: Regardless of wind and rain, day and night, with cat travel.
sentences.chinese: 无论刮风下雨，白天黑夜，带着猫猫去旅行。

sentences.english: But this is also a country of wind, lots of it.
sentences.chinese: 但是这也是多风的地区，经常刮风。

sentences.english: But it's supposed to get cloudy and windy again this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 但是，听说今天下午又要转阴刮风了。

sentences.english: When the wind blows up, all the windows rattle.
sentences.chinese: 只要一刮风，所有的窗户就吱吱地响。

sentences.english: Windy encounter rain, he will probably need long-sleeved unlined garment.
sentences.chinese: 遇到下雨刮风的话，可能会需要长袖单衣。

sentences.english: The windows can also be opened in windy and rainy days to keep the air in the room fresh.
sentences.chinese: 刮风下雨时，也可开启窗户，保持室内空气清新。

sentences.english: It's exciting to go sailing in windy days.
sentences.chinese: 在刮风的天气里出去划船是件很刺激的事。

sentences.english: A: But it’s supposed to get cloudy and windy again this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 但是，据说今天下午又要转阴刮风了。

sentences.english: Well, we’ve had cold, wind and rain over the last few weeks.
sentences.chinese: 哦，在过去的几周里，天气又冷又刮风下雨的。

sentences.english: It's stormy, but we still went out to the dinner.
sentences.chinese: 虽然刮风下雨，但是我们仍然去参加会餐。

sentences.english: I love spring because it is often windy and rains.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢春天，因为它经常刮风下雨。

sentences.english: b）She heard the wind blowing and the rain pattering against the windows.
sentences.chinese: 她听到了刮风和雨点打在窗子上的声音。

sentences.english: It's supposed to get cloudy and windy again this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 据说今天下午要转阴刮风了。

definition: to get wet in the rain
chilled to the bone/(of the wind) chilly
